TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定特定金鑰容器的存取權限。

span.span: Specifies access rights for specific key containers.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此權限被要讓使用者能夠輕鬆地管理金鑰容器，或是涉及一小部分的索引鍵，就被要授與某些索引鍵的存取時。This permission is intended to enable users to easily manage key containers when either a small number of keys is involved, or access is to be granted to only some keys.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.span: 物件，包含密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP) 參數。

span.span: A object that contains the cryptographic service provider (CSP) parameters.
A bitwise combination of the values.

summary.span: 使用指定的密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP) 參數和存取權限，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified cryptographic service provider (CSP) parameters and access permissions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式可讓存取權限，可以指派特定的金鑰容器中識別物件。This constructor allows access rights to be assigned for specific key containers identified in a object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用建構函式。The following code example shows the use of the constructor. span.span: The resulting entry would have unrestricted access.

summary.span: 使用指定的金鑰容器名稱和存取權限，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified key container name and access permissions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式可讓您指定名稱，來識別特定金鑰容器的存取權限使用星號 ("\*") 來代表所有索引鍵的容器。This constructor allows you to specify access rights for specific key containers identified by name; use an asterisk ("\*") to represent all the key containers. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用建構函式。The following code example shows the use of the constructor. summary.span: 使用指定的屬性值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式可讓您可以指派特定的金鑰容器的存取權限。This constructor allows access rights to be assigned for specific key containers. A`keySpec`或`providerType`值-1 代表所有的索引鍵的規格或提供者類型。A `keySpec` or `providerType` value of –1 represents all key specifications or provider types. A `keyStore`， `providerName`，或`keyContainerName`的"\*"代表所有的金鑰存放區、 提供者或金鑰容器。A `keyStore`, `providerName`, or `keyContainerName` of "\*" represents all key stores, providers, or key containers. A`providerName`或是`keyContainerName`也就是說`null`代表所有提供者或金鑰容器。A `providerName` or `keyContainerName` that is `null` represents all providers or key containers. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用建構函式。The following code example shows the use of the constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermission/CPP/keycontainerpermission.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermission/CS/keycontainerpermission.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermission/VB/Form1.vb#4)]

span.span: The resulting entry would have unrestricted access.

summary.span: 取得或設定金鑰容器使用權限。

span.span: Gets or sets the key container permissions.
A bitwise combination of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 這些旗標的許多功能強大，並允許只應該授與高度信任程式碼的金鑰容器的存取權。Many of these flags are powerful and permit access to key containers that should only be granted to highly trusted code. 其中最強大的旗標是， ， ， ， ， ，和。The most powerful of the flags are , , , , , , and . 如需使用這些旗標所造成的特定威脅，請參閱個別的旗標的描述。For specific threats posed by the use of these flags, see individual flag descriptions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 做為雜湊函式、 適用於雜湊演算法和資料結構，例如雜湊表。Serves as a hash function for the , suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.

summary.span: 取得或設定金鑰容器名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the key container name.
The name of the key container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的值為"\*"以套用至指定的提供者名稱和提供者類型內的所有金鑰容器的存取項目。Use a value of "\*" to apply the access entry to all key containers within the specified provider name and provider type.

exception.span: 產生的項目會具有無限制的存取權。

span.span: The resulting entry would have unrestricted access.

span.span: One of the AT_ values defined in the Wincrypt.h header file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的有效值為 AT_KEYEXCHANGE （1） 和 AT_SIGNATURE (2)。Valid values for this property are AT_KEYEXCHANGE (1) and AT_SIGNATURE (2). 預設值為 – 1，表示所有可能的值。The default value is –1, representing all possible values.

exception.span: 產生的項目會具有無限制的存取權。

The name of the key store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效值為 「 使用者 」、 「 電腦 」 或 「 \* 」。Valid values are "User", "Machine", or "\*". 如果`null`指定的值設定為"\*」。If `null` is specified, the value is set to "\*".

summary.span: 取得或設定提供者名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the provider name.
The name of the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供者名稱的範例是"Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider"。An example of a provider name is "Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider". 如果`null`指定，則會使用增強型密碼編譯提供者名稱。If `null` is specified, the enhanced cryptographic provider name is used.

exception.span: 產生的項目會具有無限制的存取權。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ProviderType { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ProviderType : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定提供者類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the provider type.

value.span: Wincrypt.h 標頭檔中定義的其中一個 PROV_ 值。

span.span: One of the PROV_ values defined in the Wincrypt.h header file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為 – 1，表示所有可能的值。The default value is –1, representing all possible values. Wincrypt.h 標頭檔會定義下列值：The Wincrypt.h header file defines the following values: - \#定義 PROV_RSA_FULL 1\#define PROV_RSA_FULL 1 - \#定義 PROV_RSA_SIG 2\#define PROV_RSA_SIG 2 - \#定義 PROV_DSS 3\#define PROV_DSS 3 - \#定義 PROV_FORTEZZA 4\#define PROV_FORTEZZA 4 - \#定義 PROV_MS_EXCHANGE 5\#define PROV_MS_EXCHANGE 5 - \#定義 PROV_SSL 6\#define PROV_SSL 6 - \#定義 PROV_RSA_SCHANNEL 12\#define PROV_RSA_SCHANNEL 12 - \#定義 PROV_DSS_DH 13\#define PROV_DSS_DH 13 - \#定義 PROV_EC_ECDSA_SIG 14\#define PROV_EC_ECDSA_SIG 14 - \#定義 PROV_EC_ECNRA_SIG 15\#define PROV_EC_ECNRA_SIG 15 - \#定義 PROV_EC_ECDSA_FULL 16\#define PROV_EC_ECDSA_FULL 16 - \#定義 PROV_EC_ECNRA_FULL 17\#define PROV_EC_ECNRA_FULL 17 - \#定義 PROV_DH_SCHANNEL 18\#define PROV_DH_SCHANNEL 18 - \#定義 PROV_SPYRUS_LYNKS 20\#define PROV_SPYRUS_LYNKS 20 - \#定義 PROV_RNG 21\#define PROV_RNG 21 - \#定義 PROV_INTEL_SEC 22\#define PROV_INTEL_SEC 22 - \#定義 PROV_REPLACE_OWF 23\#define PROV_REPLACE_OWF 23 - \#定義 PROV_RSA_AES 24\#define PROV_RSA_AES 24

exception.span: 產生的項目會具有無限制的存取權。

span.span: The resulting entry would have unrestricted access.
